definition: surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

pinyin: fan3 ying4 dui1 ran2 liao4 yuan2 jian4
ran2 liao4 yuan2 jian4 xi4 bang4

sentences.english: Where was the device that connected charge and magnetic flux?
sentences.chinese: 连接电荷和磁通量的元件在哪里？

sentences.english: Isothermal chamber is a new kind of measuring installment used to test pneumatic component flow rate characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 等温容器是一种新型气动元件流量特性测量装置。

sentences.english: Returns the default property for the specified component with a custom type descriptor.
sentences.chinese: 使用自订型别描述项，传回指定元件的预设属性。

sentences.english: The sensor consists of two sets of quartz wedges which are respectively right-handed and left-handed with equal angle.
sentences.chinese: 传感元件为两套楔角相同的左旋和右旋石英光楔。

sentences.english: In the electronic products used as demoulding agent of electronic components.
sentences.chinese: 在电子产品中可作电子元件的脱模剂。

sentences.english: An engineering calculation method for designing radius microstrip transmission line elements is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了设计径向微带线元件的一种工程计算方法。

sentences.english: Creates a container suitable for nesting controls or components.
sentences.chinese: 建立适合的容器，以巢状控制项或元件。

sentences.english: Many EGE sensors have an adjustable operating distance.
sentences.chinese: 许多发电元件传感器可调节操作的距离。

sentences.english: The turntable possesses 2 adjusting elements for the basic centring.
sentences.chinese: 转台拥有2个可调元件用于定心。

sentences.english: Again, he would not name which cars have them.
sentences.chinese: 同样，他也不会说出含有这些元件的汽车的名字。

sentences.english: Simple and compact structure, high reliability, electrical components imported components.
sentences.chinese: 结构紧凑简单，可靠性高，电器元件采用进口元件。

sentences.english: Simple and compact structure, high reliability, electrical components imported components.
sentences.chinese: 结构紧凑简单，可靠性高，电器元件采用进口元件。

sentences.english: It is obvious that beam splitter is an important component in Quasi-optical Technique.
sentences.chinese: 波束分离器是准光技术中的重要元件。

sentences.english: The cam member operably connects a temperature control knob to the thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 凸轮元件把一个温度控制旋钮可操作地连接于恒温器。

sentences.english: And China already bans the export of used computer motherboards and other discarded electronics parts.
sentences.chinese: 而中国已经禁止出口旧电脑主板和其他废弃电子元件。

sentences.english: Remember to install appropriate heat sinks to protect components from damage.
sentences.chinese: 请记住，安装适当的散热装置，以防止损坏元件。
